verses.verse: I was <S%H8055>glad<s%> when they <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3212>me<s%>, Let us go into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

<S%H8033>Where<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> go <S%H5927>up<s%>, the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of the <S%H3050>Lord<s%>, unto the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, to give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> unto the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
For there are <S%H3427>set<s%> <S%H3678>thrones<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment<s%>, the <S%H3678>thrones<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>.
<S%H7592>Pray<s%> for the <S%H7965>peace<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: they shall <S%H7951>prosper<s%> that love <S%H157>you<s%>.
<S%H7965>Peace<s%> be inside your <S%H2426>walls<s%>, and <S%H7962>prosperity<s%> inside your <S%H759>palaces<s%>.
For my <S%H251>brothers<s%> and <S%H7453>companions<s%>' <S%H1696>sakes<s%>, I will now say, Peace be inside <S%H7965>you<s%>.
Because of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> I will <S%H1245>seek<s%> your <S%H2896>good<s%>.
